thread.section_title: Caravel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good rooms at a reasonable price
thread.title_full: Very good rooms at a reasonable price - Review of Caravel Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Thomas S
title: Very good rooms at a reasonable price
text: I spent 3 nights here and would recommend it. It was spotlessly clean, the desk staff were knowledgeable and most polite, not to mention helpful. A very nice surprise was the restaurant! I had dinner one night and was afraid looking at the menu that I would not find something suitable for a vegetarian. The waiter made a suggestion which turned out to be a real winner. The waiter was also most complimentary of my Italian. That didn't hurt this review!
